75 /***********************************************************
76  * @fn - crc16
77  *
78  * @brief - make crc value for given data
79  *
80  * @param[in] - pointer address of data array.
81  * @param[in] - length of data array.
82  * @param[in] -
83  *
84  * @return - calculated crc value on given data
85  *
86  * @Note -
87 
88  */
89 
90 uint16_t Crc::crc16(uint8_t *ptr, uint16_t DataLen)
91 {
92  uint8_t crchi = 0xff;
93  uint8_t crclo = 0xff;
94  uint16_t index;
95  while (DataLen--)
96  {
97  index = crclo ^ *ptr++;
98  crclo = crchi ^ crc_table_hi[index];
99  crchi = crc_table_lo[index];
100  }
101  return (crchi << 8 | crclo);
102 }
